description: This file defines a React component responsible for rendering the header section of a web application, including logo, navigation, and action buttons.

classes.name: Header
classes.description: Main header component rendering logo, search bar, and actions.

classes.name: HeaderActions
classes.description: Subcomponent rendering upload button and related icons.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: Functional component rendering the application's header bar.

methods.name: HeaderActions
methods.description: Functional component for header action buttons, specifically upload button.
